body:
Well, today or really soon marks 2 years on this server.
OH
MA
GAWD.

Like, seriously, I can't even... This server has been better and laster longer than most of my IRL friends...

Thank you all. I just, can't believe that a simple game, on a simple server could be this amazing... What an experience. I've loved every second. I've also made incredible friends...

PeachyYas- I still can't believe you look like that... xD I asked you to join Charmy that one day, and well, I've been your friend since then. Still got the skin. ^-^ Thanks for being a great friend.

Armoredpotato- I can still rek you any day dude. Even if you are second on walls... Best walls friend ever right here.

Izjust4fun- Ok, we are like, good friends or anything, but thank you. You've helped me countless times, and you're an amazing person. 

Everyone else I neglected to add to this list but I talk to regulary- Thank you guys, from the bottom of my beating heart. You guys have made this server so amazing... Nothing could change that.

Well, two years here... 1 year, 11 months, crappy desktop: 997 kills.
1 Month, new laptop: 1500+ I believe.

So who's the nub now? 

Thank you so much though guys... 
#avicus4ever #jj2year

title: 2 Years... Thank You.

replies.body: Congrats JJ! Glad you have stayed this long. :D
